CustomField.description: Dimensions within an MDQ Product that all each segment to be priced independently. Each Product may contain several Price Dimensions. Yearly Price Dimensions are treated as Subscriptions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Dimensions within an MDQ Product that all each segment to be priced independently. Each Product may contain several Price Dimensions. Yearly Price Dimensions are treated as Subscriptions.
CustomField.label: Price Dimension
